testcase.name: verifyResponse

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected header "server" was not "pablo", was "scaffolding on HTTPServer2". Headers are: Content-Type=application/json; charset=UTF-8 Date=Fri, 13 Apr 2018 06:39:21 GMT Expires=Fri, 13 Apr 2018 06:44:21 GMT Cache-Control=public, max-age=300 Vary=Accept-Language Content-Encoding=gzip Server=scaffolding on HTTPServer2 Content-Length=10165 X-XSS-Protection=1; mode=block X-Frame-Options=SAMEORIGIN Alt-Svc=hq=":443"; ma=2592000; quic=51303432; quic=51303431; quic=51303339; quic=51303335,quic=":443"; ma=2592000; v="42,41,39,35"
